meanings.definition: Not costing a lot of money.
meanings.sent1: She found an inexpensive dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: The store offered many inexpensive options for shoppers on a budget.
meanings.sent3: The inexpensive ice cream made her day even sweeter.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright and inexpensive as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The inexpensive ticket to the concert was a steal!

meanings.sent1: The hotel room was inexpensive compared to others in the area.
meanings.sent2: They decided to buy the inexpensive car because it fit their budget.
meanings.sent3: The inexpensive pizza was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as infectious and inexpensive as a good joke.
meanings.sent5: The inexpensive necklace sparkled like a treasure.
